text.content: I was so scared to find out that I had to go on the airplane to visit my grandmother . She had been very sick and in the hospital for awhile now so I owed it to her . I would have taken the bus but it was at least a twenty four hour journey if driving . I searched some popular sites online and found the perfect flight deal . It was a round trip flight from New York to Orlando and it would only take four hours . I was scheduled to leave the following morning so I packed just enough stuff to fit on a carryon bag . The airline charged extra money based on how many bags you had . Carry ons were free and I was only staying for two days so things worked out great . I arrived and the busy airport an hour long , went through the security part which took the longest . I had just minutes before my flight would board and my nerves were getting the best of me . But once I got on things were great . I had a window seat but never looked out to see the clouds . The flight attendants were great and offered me drinks and snacks . My ears rang a little but the gum I chewed helped . There was n't any turbulence and I was by my grandmothers side before I knew it . So glad to have been able to overcome my fears .
